page.title: 18NATURE.
page.content: There are a lot of trees and fields around Pentrecelyn.There are a lot of wild animals like wild cats and foxes. The most interesting place is Nant-Y-Garth pass.The main road through Nant-Y-Garth is the A525. There is a river and a water mill near Llysfasi College.The river follows the road. Some trees in the area suffer from Dutch Elm disease.There are different types of coniferous and deciduous trees. Here is a list of some trees that grow in this area: Oak, beech, elm, birch, ash, chestnut, pine and fir trees.Some redwood trees may be found around Pentrecelyn Hall.
